articles.author: Ankur Banerjee
articles.title: Asian shares stumble after global sell-off; yen hits one-month high - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares were subdued on Thursday, with Japanese stocks sliding to their lowest in three weeks as investors sought safety, pushing the yen to a one-month high while U.S. economic worries boosted prospects for the Federal Reserve to cut rates.
